images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of the SALT architecture.Starting from the segmentation model and providing a detailed view of the SALT mechanism within the Multi-Head Attention layers of the image encoder.

Figure 2:Comparison of PEFT methods: (A) Full fine-tuning updates allWùëäWitalic_Wparameters. (B) LoRA updates low-rank matrices. (C) SVD fine-tunes scale and shift components ofWùëäWitalic_W. (D) SALT (Ours) integrates scale, shift, and low-rank updates for singular values.

Figure 3:Qualitative Vessel Segmentation.The figure displays segmentation results for five datasets (Arcade[17], Rose[14], Dias[12], X-ray Angio[2], Drive[22]). Columns show the ground truth, SALT, SAM-based PEFT methods, and traditional DL models. Predicted masks are white, and false negatives are red.
